LanguageData.VPE_SummonedSkeleton.label: skeleton
LanguageData.VPE_SummonedSkeleton.description: A psychically re-animated husk of a deceased individual. Extremely aggressive, but will soon wither away into nothing.

LanguageData.VPE_SummonedSkeleton.tools.1.label: right fist
